text: This is a list of Brazilian television related events from 1984. ==Events== ==Debuts== *Corpo a Corpo ==Television shows== ===1970s=== *Turma da Mônica (1976–present) ===1980s=== *Balão Mágico (TV series) (1983-1986) ==Births== *11 January - Milena Toscano, actress & model *10 March - Carol Castro, actress & model *16 May - André Arteche, actor *14 June - Letícia Lima, actress *18 June - Fernanda Souza, actress & TV host *12 August - Joana Balaguer, actress *8 September - André Vasco, actor & TV host *14 September - Fernanda Vasconcellos, actress *11 October - Juliana Didone, actress & former model ==Deaths== ==See also== *1984 in Brazil *List of Brazilian films of 1984
title: 1984 in Brazilian television
